channel.title: LeJazzAffair
channel.description: A Podcast with a Tech Flair Le Jazz Affair brings together two of my most favorite things. Jazz music and technology. The Le Jazz Affair podcast is produced twice weekly. This podcast features PODSAFE jazz Music found on the internet from sites like the Podsafe Music Network and Garage Band. This podcast also talks about technology in a variety of ways.
channel.itunes:summary: A Podcast with a Tech Flair Le Jazz Affair brings together two of my most favorite things. Jazz music and technology. The Le Jazz Affair podcast is produced twice weekly. This podcast features jazz Music found on the internet from sites like Amiestreet, Iodapromonet, the Podsafe Music Network and Garage Band. This podcast also talks about technology in a variety of ways.
channel.itunes:author: Sal Calfa
